trends: There have been no other sightings in Robinson
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting on the porch of the guest house on the property i live on relaxing for the evening. i suddenly saw a huge v-shaped formation of large lights coming over the house & at first thought they were a squadron of planes. there were 4 or 5 lights on each side w\ no apparent front\center light. i then realized the lights were all part of 1 huge object that was moving low, slow & w\out any apparent sound. i jumped off the porch as it went over the house because i couldn't believe what i was seeing and ran into the yard to get a better look. i watched it continue south & out of sight, all in all lasting about 15 seconds time. the whole experience was so vividly clear & w\out a doubt to be a craft that defied any rational explanation. i even called the manager of the tstc airport which is non commercial facility (where president bush would land on occasion) & he verified there were no aircraft of any sort flying in or out of there that evening.
